Html:
I got bored, so I decided to make an audio manager for techcraft.
It mostly works, except it still plays the SFX when you use a tool and you aren't pointing at any block...oh well.

All SFX are from manic digger, and the project file for XACT is included.

http://www.mediafire.com/?8ypyr2vlxh57glf

There we go. :)
I've also got Avatar integration for an XBOX version if needed.
